LUAD.Glandular Patterns: Gland-like structures; tubular; acinar; papillary formations; lined by atypical cells; mucin production
LUAD.Lepidic Growth: Alveolar growth pattern; non-invasive; early adenocarcinomas; minimally invasive adenocarcinomas
LUAD.Papillary Structures: Papillary architecture; fibrovascular cores; malignant cells lining; mucin content
LUAD.Micropapillary Features: Micropapillary pattern; small cell clusters; no fibrovascular core; clear spaces from tissue processing
LUAD.Solid Growth with Mucin: Solid growth pattern with mucin; mucicarmine; periodic acid-Schiff stains usage
LUAD.Growth Along Alveolar Walls: Lepidic growth pattern; tumor cells along alveolar walls; non-invasive
LUAD.Cellular and Nuclear Features: Cell morphology variable; cuboidal to columnar shape; hobnail appearance; pleomorphic nuclei; prominent nucleoli
LUAD.Scar Carcinoma: Association with lung scarring or fibrosis; possible misdiagnosis on imaging; requires biopsy
LUAD.EGFR Protein Overexpression: EGFR expression; membranous staining; possible cytoplasmic staining; cell membrane receptor
LUAD.ALK Fusions: ALK IHC; cytoplasmic staining; granular or diffuse; ALK protein detection
LUAD.KRAS Protein Overexpression: KRAS protein expression; cytoplasmic staining; inner cell membrane association
LUAD.PD-L1 Protein Levels: PD-L1 staining; membranous staining; cell surface expression; therapeutic implications; possible cytoplasmic staining
LUAD.MET Gene Amplification: MET receptor tyrosine kinase; crisp linear membranous staining; overexpression indication
LUAD.Lack of STK11 Gene: STK11 expression loss; null pattern; no staining in tumor; deletions in KRAS mutations association
LUAD.TP53 Protein Overexpression: p53 staining; low/moderate nuclear staining wild-type; strong/extensive or no staining abnormal; TP53 mutation indication
LUAD.BRCA1-associated protein Mutations: BAP1 loss; null pattern; no nuclear staining in tumor; non-tumor cells positive; DNA repair difficulty; oncogenesis
LUAD.Epithelial-to-mesenchymal Transition: E-cadherin staining decrease; mesenchymal markers increase; cytoplasmic/membranous staining; EMT at invasive front
LUAD.ABCA3 Protein Overexpression: ABCA3 overexpression; fine granular cytoplasmic; linear membranous staining; marked increase in alveolar type II cells
LUAD.THBS Protein Overexpression: THBS1 localization; granular pattern; extracellular matrix; secreted by cells; angiogenesis inhibition; tumor growth suppression
LUAD.High Expression of Metabolic Genes: Metabolic enzyme staining; location-specific (cytoplasmic, membranous, nuclear); example glycolysis enzymes cytoplasmic
LUAD.DNA Methylation: DNMTs nuclear localization; nuclear staining; DNA methylation at CpG sites; tumor suppressor gene hypermethylation
LUAD.Histone Modifications: Histone modification indication; nuclear staining; DNA packaging in chromatin
LUAD.Non-Coding RNAs: ncRNAs localization; nucleus or cytoplasm; miRNAs typically cytoplasmic; lncRNAs variable
LUAD.Chromatin Remodeling: Chromatin remodeling proteins; nuclear staining; gene accessibility; SWI/SNF mutations; altered gene expression
LUAD.Immune Cells: Immune cell markers; CD3, CD4, CD8 (T cells), CD20 (B cells), CD68 (macrophages); cell type-specific staining; tumor microenvironment
LUAD.Fibroblasts: α-SMA marker; cancer-associated fibroblasts (CAFs); cytoplasmic staining in fibroblasts

LUSC.Keratinization and Intercellular Bridges: Squamous differentiation; keratin production; keratin pearls; intercellular bridges
LUSC.Cell Morphology: Polygonal tumor cells; abundant eosinophilic cytoplasm; high keratin content
LUSC.Nuclear Characteristics: Hyperchromatic nuclei; prominent nucleoli; variable pleomorphism
LUSC.Increased Cellular and Nuclear Pleomorph: Cellular and nuclear pleomorphism; increased variability; indicative of higher malignancy; IHC highlighted
LUSC.High Mitotic Rate: High mitotic figure count; rapid cell proliferation; visualized by mitotic markers
LUSC.Loss of Differentiation Markers: Differentiation marker loss; less differentiated tumor; more aggressive; IHC assessment
LUSC.p53 Overexpression: TP53 mutation; p53 protein overexpression; higher grade tumor indication; IHC detection
LUSC.CDKN1A Protein Overexpression: CDKN1A (p21) nuclear staining increase; nuclear protein; p21-specific antibody usage
LUSC.SOX2 Protein Overexpression: SOX2 intense nuclear staining; transcription factor; localized in nucleus; notable at invasive tumor edges
LUSC.Invasion Depth: Deeper tissue invasion; higher grade tumor; IHC staining of tumor-stromal boundaries
LUSC.Tumor Budding: Tumor budding presence; aggressive behavior indicator; cytokeratin stains highlight
LUSC.Vascular and Lymphatic Invasion: Tumor cells in blood vessels or lymphatics; potential for metastasis; CD31 and podoplanin (D2-40) markers
LUSC.High Ki-67 Index: Ki-67 high labeling index; cellular proliferation marker; correlated with high-grade tumors; poor prognosis
LUSC.Overexpression of Growth Factor Receptor: Growth factor receptors high levels; EGFR; VEGFR; aggressive cancer behavior; IHC detection
LUSC.Reduced Expression of Cell Adhesion Mole: E-cadherin reduced expression; epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT); increased invasiveness and metastasis; IHC detection
LUSC.Expression of Metastasis-Related Protein: N-cadherin and vimentin upregulation; EMT involvement; cell migration; malignant phenotype; IHC detection
LUSC.Desmoplastic Stroma: Reactive stromal response; dense fibrous stroma surrounding tumor cells
LUSC.Intraepithelial Tumor Growth: Intraepithelial growth; tumor spread within epithelial structures
LUSC.Endobronchial Growth: Endobronchial growth; visible during bronchoscopy; growth within bronchial lumen
LUSC.Cavitation: Cavitation; central necrosis; more common in squamous cell carcinoma; visible on imaging
LUSC.Density of Inflammatory Cells: High density of inflammatory cells; lymphocytes; macrophages; dendritic cells; neutrophils; within tumor microenvironment (TME)
LUSC.Tumor-Associated Lymphocytes: Tumor-infiltrating lymphocytes (TILs); indicative of immune infiltration; predominantly T cells; CD8+ cytotoxic T cells; CD4+ helper T cells; favorable prognosis
LUSC.Immune Cell Clusters: Immune cell clusters; invasive margin; active immune surveillance; B cells; tertiary lymphoid structures; lymph node-like organization
LUSC.Expression of Immune Checkpoint Proteins: Immune checkpoint proteins overexpression; PD-L1; altered immune pathways; immune evasion; detectable by IHC
LUSC.Distribution Pattern: Immune cell distribution; diffuse infiltration favorable; marginal/patchy less favorable
LUSC.Immune Cell Morphology: Activated immune cell morphology; larger nuclei; visible nucleoli; abundant cytoplasm
